General.Name: National Petroleum Co Ltd
General.Description: National Petroleum Co., Ltd. operates gas stations. It sells gasoline and diesel fuel. The company is also involved in retail sale of lubrication and greases for automobiles and locomotives; provision of car wash services; retail supply of oil additives; and operation of parking lots and private label convenience stores. In addition, it engages in the rental of advertising billboards. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan..
